properties.title: KNX/IP Gateway Configuration
properties.host_info: Default setting is the Multicast address of KNX/IP (224.0.23.12)
properties.port_info: Default Setting is the Port of KNX/IP (3671)
properties.autoReconnect: Automatically connect to KNX BUS at start
properties.autoReconnect_no: No (To connect, pass msg.connectGateway = true to a Watchdog node)
properties.iface_name_placeholder: Interface name, ex: eth0 or ens1 or Ethernet 1 and so on...
properties.secure_multicast_physaddr_hint: Secure + Multicast: the physical address you set will sign Data Secure telegrams. Ensure this IA is configured as a Sender for the addressed Group Addresses in ETS, or devices will reject messages.

advanced.show_date_status: Show last update day and time in status
advanced.show_device_status: Show device name in status (require "Listen all Group Address" )
advanced.suppress_ack: Suppress ACK request in tunneling mode
advanced.suppress_ack_help: The option above helps old KNX/IP Interfaces compatibility. Warning: the node may not notice the disconnection from the gateway. In this case, use the watchdog in Ethernet+KNX twisted pair mode.
advanced.nodes_list_title: List of your nodes in all flows
advanced.nodes_list_help: Here is a list of all your configured KNX Nodes.
advanced.tiphost: Write EMULATE instead of the IP address, to simulate a gateway (the gateway will not connect to the KNX BUS)
advanced.delaybetweentelegramsfurtherdelayREAD: and further multiply delay only between -read- telegrams

ets.description: You can import either an ETS CSV group address list, or an ESF group address list. Please prefer the ETS CSV group address list, as the datapoints are more complete.
ets.instruction: Click for instruction on how to export ETS CSV group address list.
ets.youtube: See how to export the CSV on Youtube.
ets.help_ga: If Group Address has no Datapoint
ets.import_select_fake: Import with a fake 1.001 datapoint (Not recommended)
ets.ga_list_title: Paste here the content of the file exported from ETS, or the path to the file (e.g.: /home/pi/mycsv.csv)
ets.ga_list_help: Paste here the content of the file exported from ETS, or the path to the file (e.g.: /home/pi/mycsv.csv)
ets.deploywithETS: Some control operations will be performed. Any problems will be reported in the debug window on the right.
ets.keyring: Paste here the content of the Keyring XML file, exported from ETS
ets.youtubeKeyring: See how to export the Keyring XML file on Youtube

utility.gather_debug: Gather debug and log for troubleshoot
utility.get_all_used_ga: Get all used GA for KNX routing filter
utility.copy_ga_router: Copy these group addresses in your routing table list of your KNX/IP router.
